ygData.subject: RE: Pzygin
ygData.msgSnippet: When I killed Tomer? the teen level necro over and over the faction went up with the clerics, etc.. and went down with something that looked like it would
ygData.messageBody:
When I killed Tomer? the teen level necro over and
over the faction went up with the clerics, etc.. and
went down with something that looked like it would
affect a necro type, I don't recall the names.

Belgarth

--- Sam Powell <sam@ti.l-3com.com> wrote:
> From: "Sam Powell" <sam@ti.l-3com.com>
>
> This is where SHE spawns, =), but she doesn't really
> stay there. She jumped
> my ranger when he was level 12 south of BB and
> killed me. I'm interested to
> know if there are any faction hits when she's
> killed, as I'd like to take
> her out with my necro. I've only seen her at night.
